attributes.action: Stop the quota system and quite rightly make it best person for the job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All we see now are employers particularly in the public sector employing people without the desired skills or lowing the skill requirements so to fit their quotas of people who fit into a certain group. 

This positive discrimination is wrong and the best person for the job should always be the only reason for recruiting someone.  It is essential the best person is in that job particularly in the public sector, such as doctors, fire fighters, police officers etc.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
